Description:
Unpolished Diamond!!!
Bring back the sparkle to this perfectly positioned 3-bedroom plus study home with a little TLC! Upon entry, a generous formal lounge; accompanied by a smartly presented kitchen showcasing stainless steel appliances, flowing on to the spacious meals/living area. The master bedroom includes a walk-in robe and full en-suite.
Further highlights include sweeping floorboards, central heating, split system cooling and double remote-control garage.
Exceptionally located in the Aurora Estate, the property is surrounded by parks, schools, new shopping centre and with is easy access to the Western Ring Road.
Whether you're in the market for your first property, looking to increase your property portfolio, this great value home is waiting for you. So be quick and inspect now!!!

Description:
Low Maintenance Living In The Lyndarum Estate
Moments from Epping Views primary and Harvest Home Reserve, and literally steps away from the cafes, supermarket and shopping options of Lyndarum Village, this three-bedroom, two bathroom town residence will provide the perfect start, fabulous family accommodation, or a wonderful option for those looking to downsize without compromise.
Immaculately presented, generously proportioned and neutral toned, light filled spaces include a ground floor comprising a true laundry, powder room and spacious open plan living zone. Wrapping around a quality kitchen finished with Blanco stainless steel appliances, it features a breakfast bar for weekend meals on the go. Sliding doors peel back for easy access to a generous courtyard, ready for outdoor dining and entertaining.
The first level introduces an expansive living room/rumpus retreat anchoring a main bedroom (ensuite and balcony) and two further bedrooms sharing the deluxe family bathroom.
Split system cooling & heating unit and double garage with internal access lead a list of inclusions in package that's sure to please.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
SOLD BY KALLEY SINGH & SUNIL KUMAR!!
Titled Flat Block & Ready to Built!
Brilliant opportunity to purchase this premium corner block of land measuring approximately 303 m2. Outstanding location near Epping Train Stations, Westfield Shopping Centre, Epping Pacific Plaza, Epping View and Harvest Home Primary Schools, community facilities and New Aurora Shopping Centre on Edgars Road including Coles, ALDI, local shops.
Titled Lands becoming harder to find in this established part of Epping, act quickly before it gets sold!
Call now for more information!

SOLD BY TEAM SKAD CHETAN CHAUHAN & DAVE SINGH!! MORE PROPERTIES WANTED !!!
This top floor apartment is close to all amenities and just minutes away from Epping PLaza, Northern Hospital, schools and transport. Comprising of open plan living, kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and Caesar stone bench tops, one bedroom with built in robe, central bathroom, separate laundry and storage room. Features include split system heating and cooling, ceramic tiles and carpet throughout and a private balcony with city views. Also includes underground secure parking space and storage cage.

Description:
Impeccable Design with Immense Opportunities!
A unique lifestyle awaits the lucky occupant with winters curled up in front of the fire place and summers spent entertaining guests with BBQs in the backyard. Introducing three large bedrooms, multiple living areas adjoining a separate large kitchen that overlooks a one of a kind hand-made fountain allowing for a true sense of tranquillity encompassing the property. Extras include a recently refurbished central bathroom, central heating and a large retreat/work shop area. With close proximity to shops, schools, public transport and parklands making this an ideal home that is a must inspect!

Description:
Fabulous First Step Towards A Wonderful Future
Perfectly presented, in a fabulous spot and featuring ducted heating and cooling, polished timber floors, roller shutters and a relaxed flow between indoors and out, this superb family home is the ideal opportunity for first home buyers looking to enjoy easy living from day one.
Formal living dining complements a large family meals zone which includes a pristine kitchen and opens to a decked alfresco. Clever design has it stepping down to a multi vehicle carport behind a roller door that delivers further spaces for entertaining, or for the kids to enjoy on a wet day, when they don't want to be inside. A dedicated BBQ area keeps the cooking spaces separate from the entertaining.
Close enough to the school the kids should never be late again and a short walk from Greenbrook Village, it is seriously central to both Epping Plaza and Epping Train Station.

Description:
"Stylish, Spacious & Location"
This boutique, modern home is situated in the heart of Epping & ticks all the boxes.
Spacious, low-maintenance & quality finishes throughout; only walking distance to the Lyndarum Shopping Centre with the Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, schools, public transport & Northern Hospital all nearby.
Huge open plan living with café style doors opens to a stylish private courtyard (with shed, pergola & timber feature wall) setting the perfect entertaining scene. Contemporary style kitchen with tiled splash back, Ariston stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & ample cupboard storage.
Timber flooring, separate laundry, powder room, single LU garage (polished concrete & overhead storage), tinted windows & split system heating/cooling throughout all complement this magnificent home. Corner position with a private park next door & balcony overlooking a beautiful protected Red River Gum Tree.
This is a fantastic chance to enter the property market & establish yourself in the rapid growing suburb of Epping.
Don’t let this opportunity pass.
For all enquiries contact:
Michael Del Monte
0408 190 711

Perfect location, Allotment of 616m2 Block
A beautiful double story 5 bedroom family home catering for all your needs.
Brilliantly positioned in the prestigious Hayston Valley Estate of Epping Conveniently located close to shopping's, transport and established schools which makes it the perfect home for families. This 5-bedroom home features a spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining area that overlooks the landscaped rear yard, a huge formal lounge and the bonus of a retreat area upstairs.
Added features include:
Master with full ensuite & WIR,

Description:
PERFECT FAMILY ENTERTAINER
This ultimate family home is set on a generous corner allotment in the popular Aurora Estate, within walking distance to Aurora Town Centre, local schools, parks and recreation (Tennis & Basketball courts) at your door step and close proximity to Northern Hospital, Pacific Epping Shopping Centre and Freeway. You will be enchanted by the beautiful low maintenance fully landscaped gardens that will lead you to the main entrance.
Offering 3 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, Master bedroom with full ensuite & walk in robe, laundry and spacious central bathroom. Boasting a huge family living and dining area that includes surround sound system with projector and screen .Complemented with a stylish kitchen including 900mm stainless steel appliances with open plan living filed with natural light leading to alfresco and huge backyard with picturesque gardens & outdoor entertaining area Further features includes the comfort of ducted heating, split system cooling, alarm, LED lights, double remote garage with internal access, ample storage options and panels. And much much more. Inspection is a must to be appreciated.

Description:
Fully-Optioned Family Perfection
A sought-after family neighbourhood in the heart of Epping provides an idyllic setting for this elevated home that's sure to exceed all expectations with its versatile floorplan and outstanding features. Immaculate throughout, the home's light-filled interior comprises four double bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite), study and main family bathroom complete with spa bath. Flexible living zones include formal lounge with high vaulted ceilings, open family/meals area leading through to the spacious rear living room. Add to this a timber-cabinet kitchen with DeLonghi appliances, ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm and security shutters all-round, plus an enormous undercover entertaining area, delightful backyard garden, under-house storage space, double garage (r/c) and additional carport via wide driveway. Positioned for absolute convenience, walking distance to Dalton Road buses and Epping Station, popular schools including St Monica's College, kindergarten and Melbourne Polytechnic, Epping Pacific Shopping Centre, cafes and restaurants, as well as easy access to the Ring Road.

Description:
Perfect beginnings for a beautiful investment
This charming, nicely situated residence can be the foundation for the perfect start on your property journey,doubling as a solid investment in a highly sought after,thriving location.
Upon entry to this fabulous home, perfect for the casual conversation, a generous Sitting/Living space greets you warmly. Bathed in natural light, a spacious Master bedroom with walk-in robe and a full ensuite also sits nicely towards the front of the property.
Upon further inspection, the home opens to a grand space that includes a Modern Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a well-proportioned Dining Area, with a second, perfect for entertaining Living zone. Further adding to the charm of this home, the remaining generous 2 Bedrooms with built in robes, stays close to a large central Bathroom for convenient use. With great appreciation, the ample sized Laundry room has its own easy access outdoors.
Greatly enhancing the spaces of this beautiful home, are a massive veranda covered outdoor entertainment alfresco and a landscaped spacious backyard with anallocated BBQ area.
Other wonderful features of this charming residence includes:
- Double car garage with rear roller door access.
- Ducted heating throughout.
- Brand new air conditioner- split system
- Security system with remote control electric shutters.
- LED downlights throughout.
Amenities within close proximity include:
- Westfield Plenty Valley Shopping Centre
- Epping Plaza Shopping Centre
- Across the road from Meadow Glen Athletics Centre Reserve
- Mill Park Secondary College
- Meadow Glen Primary School
- South Morang Train station within walking distance

Description:
Centrally Located Quality Ex-Display Home
Perfectly located in one of Epping's most sought after locations, this sensational single level family home is guaranteed to impress!
With parklands opposite, childcare/kindergarten, public transport and Harvest Home Primary School only minutes away, 200 metres approx to Galada Community Centre and Aurora Village with doctors, chemist, Coles, Aldi, 24-hour gym, Degani's Café, plus so much more. From the moment you step inside be prepared to fall in love with this contemporary residence, it will exceed all expectations with its flexible floorplan that allows the family to interact, yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. Comprising of four bedrooms all with built in robes (main with a walk in robe and ensuite with his and her vanity and double shower), multiple living areas include a kids retreat, family living area, rumpus room, study and an open plan family/dining area complemented by a well appointed kitchen with ample cupboard space, Caesar stone benchtops, glass splash back, walk in pantry with an automatic light and power points, 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances and a dishwasher.
Stunning alfresco area opening from family room with large bi-fold doors to expose gas fireplace on feature wall. Glass sliding doors can enclose this decked area with ceiling fan, when need be, to maximise winter sun and warmth. Added extra is a streamline BBQ with gas connection to house.
Additional features include fibre to the home, 6-star energy rating, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, split system heating/cooling, alarm system, roller shutters, double glazed windows, solar panels for gas hot water, LED downlights throughout, tropical look garden with automatic recycled water underground system, plus quality carpet and large tiles throughout. Also, internal entry through the double garage with remote control roller door, plus workshop with water, cupboards and power.
Quiet neighbourhood, and substantial block size of 480m2 approx with access to major M80 Ringroad, Epping Pacific and Northern Hospital a short drive away.
This delightful home is ready to move right in and enjoy!
Insights: 20 Corbett Avenue, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2018 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Location!
Situated in prime location only minutes away from all your local amenities such as Epping Train Station, St Monica's college, St Peters Primary, Greenbrook Shops, Epping Pacific Shopping Centre, parklands and public transport.
Whether you are a first home buyer or astute investor this is the ideal home for you. Comprising of three large bedrooms with BIR's to the master bedroom serviced by a bright filled central bathroom, family sized living area guiding you through to the kitchen with ample storage space overlooking the spacious dining area.
Boasting an outdoor entertainment area perfect to host family and guests leaving generous space in the backyard for the kids to play.
Further features include evaporative cooling, wall unit heating, storage shed, timber flooring, solar panels and well-manicured gardens.
Call today to inspect!
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
767 High Street Epping
219 High Street Thomastown
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
952-954 High Street Reservoir

Description:
Enticing Opportunity. Exciting Prospects
Whether you are chasing a fine first home or an affordable investment you need to put this brilliant Baystone opportunity on your list. Whatever your priority, this three bedroom home on a generous corner allotment will fill the bill.
Freshly painted, newly carpeted and placed for easy living, it's moments from the bus, Greenbrook Village is a short distance away and Westfield and the station are easily accessible.
Timber floors enhance the formal lounge which opens to a paved outdoor area, while the family meals overlooked by the pristine kitchen steps out to a decked entertainment area in a wrap-around rear yard. Featuring built in robes and ceiling fans, the three bedrooms share the family bathroom.
Adding to the appeal the NBN is connected and both the garage and carport are accessed via a gate from Glenoth Court.

Description:
Affordable Opportunity. Desirable Pocket
Just moments to the bus, school and expansive parklands and an easy stroll to Greenbrook Village, look no further if you are a first-home buyer or investor keen on an affordable entry in this preferred pocket. A short drive or bus ride to Westfield and the station, the warm, inviting interior includes three bedrooms, updated bathroom with a freestanding bath, "L" shaped living dining and a well laid out kitchen. Finished with Bosch appliances, it overlooks the family meals area. Deep and wide the rear yard introduces two alfresco zones. Separated by a broad expanse of lawn, one includes a woodfire pizza oven, while the other offers built in seating. Both are roofed for year-round enjoyment. With ducted heating and evaporative cooling, timber floors, secure covered parking behind a roller door on a generous allotment. You'll need to move fast to make McFarlane mine.
